Text:
HOW TO PLAY MP (Multiplayer/LAN):

Google Tunngle
Download & Install Tunngle
Start and Login into Tunngle
On Left Side in "Network Search" type "Sins" without " and press Enter
Join "Sins of a Solar Empire" Network
Start Sins of a Solar Empire Rebellion Game
Go to LAN
Host or Join a Game
PLAY WITH PEOPLE
THE END
AVG says virus >.< False alarm probably tho

@SoThEr2

Alternately[sic] be a shitlord. Hamachi is a terrible program. Doesn't even work half the time.
hamachi is just as good as tunngle, but tunngle has a community and the sins rebellion network usually has 50-100 people in at all times

If anybody is looking for an active sins network on hamachi, theres a diplomacy one still going strong, but players there usually play Rebellion now. We have 3vs3's almost every day.

Network: Sins Diplomacy 1
Password: 123

If you're inactive, please dont join. You will be kicked.
